rules.title: Civil Code
rules.intro1: We are pleased that you would like to play on our server. To ensure a good playing experience for all players, you must adhere to some rules.
rules.intro2: The rules can be changed at any time by the server team and it is your duty to inform yourself of any changes. Major changes will be announced in advance.
rules.respectfullness: Behave respectfully and fairly towards the other players and the team.
rules.hacks: The use of mods, hacks and other tools that give you an advantage over other players is prohibited! (This includes, for example: X-Ray, fly, bot, etc.) If you are unsure, ask an admin!
rules.contents: Racist, offensive, pornographic, violence-glorifying or illegal content under German law is prohibited on the entire server.
rules.skin_and_name: Your skin and player name must not stand out in any negative way or violate the rules.
rules.bugusing: Exploiting bugs is strictly prohibited. This includes Minecraft bugs as well as bugs in our plugins and datapacks. If you find a bug, please report it to the server team immediately!
rules.lost_items: Disappeared items due to server and plugin or datapack errors will not be replaced.
rules.chat: Spamming, caps, advertising, insults, trolling, threats or violations of applicable law are not tolerated anywhere, not even in whisper.
rules.reporting: If someone is unpleasantly harassing you in the chat, please contact the server team in confidence.
rules.links: The player who sent the link is responsible for the links in the chat. Always be careful when opening them.
